body:
I already see active posters in this guild, even though we're not even at 70 subscribers yet! If you're interested in becoming a guildmaster here, please reply to this post answering the following questions:

---

1. Why do you want to become a master of this guild?

2. What would you do as a guildmaster here? What would you bring to our team?

3. What, if anything, would you want to change about this guild (just curious)?

4. Do you know the rules of this guild well enough to make informed decisions? (the answer is yes, because I'm telling you the rules right now: only posts which are not even tangentially related to foxes (or against Ruqqus rules ofc) are to be kicked. Bans/exiles are only to be applied in extreme circumstances.)

5. Anything else you would like us to know about you?
body_html:
I already see active posters in this guild, even though we're not even at 70 subscribers yet! If you're interested in becoming a guildmaster here, please reply to this post answering the following questions:

  2. What would you do as a guildmaster here? What would you bring to our team?

  3. What, if anything, would you want to change about this guild (just curious)?

  4. Do you know the rules of this guild well enough to make informed decisions? (the answer is yes, because I'm telling you the rules right now: only posts which are not even tangentially related to foxes (or against Ruqqus rules ofc) are to be kicked. Bans/exiles are only to be applied in extreme circumstances.)

  5. Anything else you would like us to know about you?

title: This guild is looking for guildmasters (mods)!

body:
1 - I was looking for a guild related to foxes and found this guild, would like to help out

2 -I would add new content and raise awareness that this guild exists on other sites

3 - I'm pretty happy with the rules and as long as what is posted is relevant it's good 

4 - yes, be about foxes and follow sitewide rules

thanks for your consideration :)
body_html:
1 - I was looking for a guild related to foxes and found this guild, would like to help out

2 -I would add new content and raise awareness that this guild exists on other sites

3 - I'm pretty happy with the rules and as long as what is posted is relevant it's good

4 - yes, be about foxes and follow sitewide rules

thanks for your consideration :)

body:
shit, why not :D

1.  Came here from reddit, this guild is the reason i have a ruqqus account.
2. Post foxes, be that one guy that never seems to sleep, and keep the sub on-topic. Also, id bring floof :3
3. Honestly, nothing, its perfect
4. yep, i know the rules
5. im a furry

  3. Honestly, nothing, its perfect
  4. yep, i know the rules
  5. im a furry

author.bio:
火狐, pronounced Huǒhú is the Chinese nickname for the Red Panda, meaning Firefox.

Guildmaker of +Bamboo, +Medieval, +Norf_FC, +RedPandaMemes, +Doge, +iLoveScience and +ThisDayLastYear
